survey_name: Online Fitness Class Instructor Effectiveness Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate participant satisfaction with online fitness class instructors, focusing on teaching style, engagement, and overall effectiveness.

questions.question_text: How often do you attend online fitness classes?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout for mobile-friendliness.

script.question_text: How often do you attend online fitness classes?

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes your primary reason for taking online fitness classes?
questions.client_notes: Allow 'Other' option with an open-text field if selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with conditional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following best describes your primary reason for taking online fitness classes?

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the clarity of instruction in your online fitness classes? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with clear labels for accessibility.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the clarity of instruction in your online fitness classes? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.question_text: What aspects of the instructor’s teaching style do you find most effective? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Providing modifications for different skill levels
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes are ideal for this question.

script.question_text: What aspects of the instructor’s teaching style do you find most effective? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Providing modifications for different skill levels

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this instructor to a friend? (0 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
questions.client_notes: Use a numerical slider for a more interactive experience.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this instructor to a friend? (0 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the instructor?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for participants who rated satisfaction ≤ 3 in Q3 or Q5
questions.client_notes: Open-text field to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the instructor?
script.routing_logic: Appears for participants who rated satisfaction ≤ 3 in Q3 or Q5

questions.question_text: Do you feel the instructor provides adequate encouragement during classes?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with neutral options for balanced feedback.

script.question_text: Do you feel the instructor provides adequate encouragement during classes?

questions.question_text: Which types of fitness classes do you prefer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with an 'Other' option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with conditional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which types of fitness classes do you prefer? (Select all that apply)
